title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Protecting Your Infrastructure with Amazon Threat Intelligence (SEC311)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon 威胁情报保护您的基础设施 (SEC311)
abstract: Come see how AWS Security processes 5 billion events per second to transparently protect all AWS customers. Learn how AWS builds and  leverages threat intelligence so customers can protect their infrastructure  through three key components: MadPot threat disruption system, Amazon Threat  Intelligence, and active threat defense architecture. We'll deep dive into  our data architectures used to analyze against incoming security data, our  threat intelligence capabilities and how they are integrated into AWS  security services. Discover how to maximize these intelligence-driven  services within your own security operations and improve your cloud security  posture.
abstract_cn: 来看看 AWS 安全如何每秒处理 50 亿个事件，以透明地保护所有 AWS 客户。了解 AWS 如何构建和利用威胁情报，使客户能够通过三个关键组件保护其基础设施：MadPot 威胁破坏系统、Amazon 威胁情报和主动威胁防御架构。我们将深入探讨用于分析传入安全数据的数据架构、我们的威胁情报能力以及它们如何集成到 AWS 安全服务中。了解如何在您自己的安全运营中最大化利用这些情报驱动的服务，并改善您的云安全态势。
